titleStmt.title: Andy Barnett to F. G. Murphy
CWG11958

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: 37th - 76th Regiments Enrolled Militia Primary Source Documents (1861-1866)
msIdentifier.idno: Box 80, Folder 861 GREEN COUNTY Cpt. Benjamin W. Penick 46th Rgt. Ky. Militia Bond for Arms

body.p: Dear Sir, The enclosed is for Gov Magoffin which we fear would not go safely throu the Lincoln mails, therefore send to you a less suspicious personage will you hand it over all is right. We have a fine meeting yesterday & fine speeches

Refer to Sec of Board
B. M
